actions.parameters: 4;Any;Objective: don't let enemies capture the tower in the middle of the Oasis.
4;Any;You will win, if you manage to hold on for 90 minutes.
4;Any;Player1 can change difficulty by moving units into the circle on the right.
4;Any;The more swordmen you move, the more difficult the game will be.
4;Any;You have until the in-game time reaches two minutes to decide.
4;Any;Players 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8 must be controlled by the new AI.
4;Any;There needs to be at least 1 soldier in the circle in the north.
4;Any;Ship crashed at the west coast! You have 5 minutes to pick its cargo!
4;Any;We found resources in the wastelands in the north!
4;Any;We retrieved some materials from ship wreckage in the west coast!
4;Any;Looks like the dead still hold many treasures. Visit the graveyard!
4;Any;We have found a weapon stash in the north!
4;Any;We have found more weapons in the west coast!
4;Any;We dug up food from the graves. It's not like the dead need it anymore.
4;Any;There might be some more food and weapons in the wastelands!
4;Any;Our weapons transport has arrived in the west coast!
